content:
Here are ten popular hotel and resort websites that people often visit when planning a trip:

1. Marriott.com
2. Hilton.com
3. Hyatt.com
4. Intercontinental.com
5. Sheraton.com
6. Westin.com
7. FourSeasons.com
8. RitzCarlton.com
9. AccorHotels.com
10. BestWestern.com

Again, it's worth noting that the popularity of these websites can vary by region, and this list is intended to be a general overview. Many people visit multiple hotel and resort websites when planning a trip, as they compare prices and options across different properties. In addition to these websites, people may also visit online travel agencies (OTAs) and other websites to gather information about their vacation options.
